documenttitle.text: Red Hat Security Advisory: ovirt-ansible-roles security update

note.text:
An update for ovirt-ansible-roles is now available for Red Hat Virtualization Engine 4.1.

Red Hat Product Security has rated this update as having a security impact of Low. A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE link(s) in the References section.
note.title: Topic

note.text:
The ovirt-ansible-roles package contains Ansible roles which automate common Red Hat Virtualization administration tasks.

Security Fix(es):

* ovirt-ansible-roles: passwords revealed in ansible log when provisioning new provider (CVE-2018-1117)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

description.text:

https://access.redhat.com/articles/11258
